Logiciels Installés

Si votre logiciel ne figure pas dans la liste, merci de vous référer à la procédure d'installation.
Le responsable est la personne a contacté pour toute information relative à l'utilisation du logiciel. Pour tout problème technique, merci de vous adresser au personnel du PT6.

En ligne de commande

Eigen Tanguy Ctemplate library for linear algebra: matrices, vectors, numerical solvers, and related algorithms. |FastQC |Tanguy |A quality control tool for high throughput sequence data. | |FASTX-Toolkit |Tanguy |The FASTX-Toolkit is a collection of command line tools for Short-Reads FASTA/FASTQ files preprocessing. | |FreeBayes |Lilia | Bayesian genetic variant detector. | |GATK |Tanguy |A software package to analyse next-generation resequencing data. | |HTSeq |Tanguy |Analysing high-throughput sequencing data with Python. | |JELLYFISH |Tanguy |Fast, Parallel k-mer Counting for DNA. | |MaSuRCA |Tanguy |MaSuRCA assembler. | |Mothur |Lilia |Fills the bioinformatics needs of the microbial ecology community. | |PhyloSift |Tanguy |Phylogenetic and taxonomic analysis for genomes and metagenomes. | |Picard |Tanguy |Java-based command-line utilities that manipulate SAM files. | |PRINSEQ |Tanguy |PReprocessing and INformation of SEQuence data. | |RNA-SeQC |Tanguy |A java program which computes a series of quality control metrics for RNA-seq data. | |SAMTools |Tanguy |Provides various utilities for manipulating alignments in the SAM format. | |SOAPdenovo2 |Tanguy | Short Oligonucleotide Analysis Package. | |SortMeRNA |Tanguy |A software designed to rapidly filter ribosomal RNA fragments from metatranscriptomic data. | |SPAdes |Tanguy |Genome Assembler. | |STAR |Tanguy |Spliced Transcripts Alignment to a Reference. | |TopHat |Tanguy |A spliced read mapper for RNA-Seq. | |Velvet |Tanguy |Sequence assembler for very short reads. | ^Librairies ^Responsable ^Description ^ |Boost |Tanguy |Free peer-reviewed portable C source libraries.

Services

Services Responsable Description
Galaxy Tanguy An open, web-based platform for data intensive biomedical research.
QIIME Lilia An open source software package for comparison and analysis of microbial communities.

DokuWikiTanguy A simple to use and highly versatile Open Source wiki software that doesn't require a database.
wwwblastTanguyA wwwblast installation allows a researcher to use BLAST to search a sequence database using a graphical user interface.
